title: Rooibos Steam Facial
description: Use hot rooibos for a gentle facial steam.

title: Rooibos Hair Rinse
description: Rinse hair with cooled rooibos for shine and scalp health.

title: Rooibos & Honey Face Mask
description: Mix rooibos with honey and oatmeal for a soothing mask.

title: Rooibos Face Mist
description: Mix rooibos tea with rose water and aloe in a spray bottle.

title: Rooibos Bath Soak
description: Combine rooibos, Epsom salt, lavender, and baking soda.
